derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Spanish, from Aymara allpaca

entry.def: Alpaca is a type of soft wool.
Alpacas are South American animals similar to llamas. Their hair is the source of alpaca wool.

means.word_mean: 2. a thin glossy fabric made of the wool of the alpaca, or a rayon or cotton imitation
3. domesticated llama with long silky fleece; believed to be a domesticated variety of the guanaco
